attributes.action: Review foreign political donation rule to ensure our democracy is influence free
attributes.additional_details: Review the guidelines to ensure there are no loopholes and make any financial donations transparent,
attributes.background:
Review foreign political donation rules to ensure our democracy is influence free from corporations, foreign parties and high net-worth individuals with an agenda. 

Our democracy deserves to be fortified from loopholes, as we’ve seen abroad just how easily it can be influenced.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
